data.title: Form 24: Data Package Cover Page and Checklist
data.excerpt: The licensed laboratory shall compile and generate one data package for each representative sample that the laboratory analyzes, prior to release of the certificate of analysis (COA). This form shall be signed and dated by the reviewing supervisory or management laboratory employee meeting the responsibilities and qualifications under 4 CCR section 15737.
